name: Forever Young
lyrics: forever young  dance style, dance heaven wait, watching skies hoping best expecting worst gonna drop bomb not?   let us die young let us live forever power never say never sitting sandpit, life short trip music's sad men  imagine race won turn golden faces sun praising leaders, getting tune music's played the, mad man   forever young, want forever young really want live forever? forever, forever young, want forever young really want live forever? forever young   water, heat melody beat sooner later, will gone stay young   hard old without cause want perish fading horse youth's diamonds sun diamonds forever might many adventures happen today many songs forgot play many dreams swinging blue let come true   forever young, want forever young really want live forever? forever, forever young, want forever young really want live forever? forever,   forever young, wanna forever young really want live forever?

lyrics: wake go go  jitterbug jitterbug jitterbug jitterbug   put boom boom heart send soul sky high lovin' starts jitterbug brain  goes bang bang bang 'til feet  something's buggin' something ain't right best friend told last night left sleepin' bed dreamin' should've instead   wake go go leave hanging yo yo wake go go wanna miss hit high wake go go 'cause plannin' going solo wake go go take dancing tonight wanna hit high yeah, yeah   take grey skies way make sun shine brighter doris day turned bright spark flame  beats per minute never 'cause lady, fool makes crazy act cruel come on, baby, fight go dancing, everything will right might wake go go leave hanging yo yo wake go go wanna miss hit high wake go go 'cause plannin' going solo wake go go take dancing tonight wanna hit high yeah, yeah, yeah baby   jitterbug jitterbug   cuddle up, baby, move tight go dancing tomorrow night cold there, warm bed dance, stay home instead jitterbug   wake go go leave hanging yo yo wake go go wanna miss hit high wake go go 'cause plannin' going solo wake go go take dancing tonight wake go go  leave hanging yo yo wake go go  wanna miss hit high  wake go go 'cause plannin' going solo  wake go go take dancing tonight yeah, yeah
